name: Homewood Suites Miami-Airport West

reviews.text: Upon returning from the Caribbean we stayed overnight at this hotel while waiting for a connecting flight home the next day. The front desk was courteous and effecient. We were directed to a room on the third floor at the far reaches of the hotel. The room was clean, well furnished and more than I expected.
reviews.title: Great hotel and good value

reviews.text: The remnants of Hurricane Rina were drenching South Florida at the time. After settling into our room we ventured down to the front desk and asked advice on a local restaurant. To my surprise the front desk clerk radioed the shuttle bus who took us to a local restaurant for dinner..............and came back later to retreive us when no taxis were available. This was unexpectedly kind service. I highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Older property, cramped dinning area.

reviews.text: This is a older small property compared to my previous stays at other properties. Small dining area hard to get around if crowded. Unlike othe locations, they use plastic ware vice metal knives, forks, spoons, etc. Location could be difficult to get in and out of during rush hour traffic due to no sign light to cross the main road. Rate overall average due to small cramped dining area and ingress and egress to the property
reviews.title: Good complete hotel. Nice staff!!

reviews.text: I arrived MIA about 11pm, but make coordination in advance for a shuttle and after waiting about 20 min the shuttle arrived. Check was fast and easy.
reviews.title: Best Deal in the MIA Area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room is nice, with a small kitchen, sofa, and separate room. I got a $90 discount rate because of a meeting I was attending nearby.
reviews.title: Best Choice in Miami

reviews.text: Service was excellent from the front desk to the breakfast staff. Miguel whom ran the managers reception made the extra effort to connect with us and make us feel at home.
reviews.title: Our home away from home

reviews.text: Location is great just off the highway, however is a little loud at time because of the airport however is to be expected since its close by.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: Pool was heated and very warm, also there was a basketball court as well, great for keeping children and even the adults occupied.
reviews.title: Clean, large rooms with great amenities

reviews.text: Rooms were spacious and clean, housekeeping staff did a wonderful thorough job.
reviews.title: Great Hotel for Business Travelers!

reviews.text: We will we returning on our next trip to Miami!!
reviews.title: Great Staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Do not be misled by the high rating. This is a 3 star hotel with facilities at that level but this must be among the better hotels in this category we have used.
reviews.title: Excellent example of its type

reviews.text: It is typical Homewood. Comfortable rooms and spotlessly clean. The breakfast and evening snack are fairly basic but very acceptable - surprisingly though, no juice at breakfast although this can be purchased for $2-3 from the mini shop. Staff we encountered were very friendly.
reviews.title: True to the Homewood Suites Brand...with a few missteps.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is an outdoor pool - may be heated with reasonable seating area but this is directly under the flightpath of incoming and low aircraft. It seemed that flights did not start until about 7am though - or if they did we did not hear them.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay

reviews.text: The hotel was pretty full as there was some sort of training event going on but nevertheless we had no problem finding seating.
reviews.title: Best staff, accommodating even a 5 am shuttle to airport! Awesome stay!

reviews.text: If you are looking for an overnight close to MIA and do not want to bother to go out to eat this is well worth considering. There are fast food outlets within easy walk.
reviews.title: Good value for your money

reviews.text: I stay here for business and it's a nice hotel. The food isn't outstanding but it's free and really makes a difference when you have worked a long day and need something quick. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. I really enjoy staying here as other obviously do because if I have to make a last minute trip to MIA it's booked! Staff is extremely friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Nice and convenient

reviews.text: My family and I have been staying at this hotel since its opening about 4 times a year . Its a wonderful place, excellent service, comfortable and clean rooms, good breakfast and light dinners. The staff: Jenny, Yube, Leidy, Martha, Raymond, Miguel, Santa, Johanna and the Sales Manager, and others all go out of their way to make your stay an unforgettable one. I definetely recommend here. The location is perfect as it's right off the Palmetto Highway. There's also a complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport, Dolphin Mall, International Mall, Walmart, Publix and a few other nearby places in case you don't have a car.
reviews.title: Our home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a week, and for the most part enjoyed it. The rooms were large and clean and well maintained. King sizes bed was very comfortable but the shower felt cramped. I guess those bent shower curtain rods really do give you more room. The shower in our room had glass doors so there was not the shoulder room you get with a curtain.
reviews.title: Nice place, but not without issues

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The included breakfasts were edible, but nothing was really hot. Most of the so called hot food was only warm, but the temperature was a whole lot lower than, i think, safe food handling recommendations would permit, but isn't that what an immune system us for? I never actually tested temps other than with my tongue. Taste was good for the most part. Coffee was strong and hot.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: They have their welcome home dinner available weeknight. Again, nothing spectacular and nothing really hot. But there was wine and beer included.
reviews.title: Horrible Staff attitude
